meanings.sent1: The archery board is targetable for practicing my aim.
meanings.sent2: The new advertising campaign has specific targetable goals.
meanings.sent3: The targetable bullseye on the dartboard seemed to mock my poor aim.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a targetable beacon in the crowded room.
meanings.sent5: The targetable weakness in the enemy's defense was our key to victory.

meanings.definition: Able to be aimed at or focused on.
meanings.sent1: The telescope's targetable lens allowed for precise stargazing.
meanings.sent2: The targetable spotlight illuminated the stage perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The targetable squirrel kept dodging my attempts to take its picture.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like targetable arrows hitting their mark.
meanings.sent5: The targetable goal of the project kept everyone motivated and on track.
